turn.4: Rupel Boom F.C. Koninklijke Rupel Boom FC is a Belgian association football club based in Boom, Antwerp province currently playing in the Belgian First Amateur.
turn.6: They play at the Gemeentelijk Parkstadion in Boom.
turn.8: K. Rupel Boom FC was founded in 1998, a result of a merger between K. Boom F.C. and Rupel SK.
turn.10: The club started playing in the regional third division of the Belgian provincial leagues.
turn.11: When did the club stop playing?
turn.12: In 1999 they were promoted to the regional second division and in 2001 to the regional first division.
